# Add Title, Subtitle, Axes Labels
<p>&nbsp;</p>
.pull-left[
```{r eval=FALSE, echo=TRUE}

p +
  xlab("Longitude") +
  ylab("Latitude") +
  ggtitle("World Map",
    subtitle =
    paste0("(" ,length(unique(world$name)),
           "countries)" ))
```
]

.pull-right[
![](https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/51021633627_87a9a86d0b_b.jpg)
]

---
# Color

.red[palettes]

.pull-left[
```{r eval = FALSE, echo=TRUE}
p +
  geom_sf(aes(fill = pop_est)) +
  scale_fill_viridis_c( trans = "sqrt")
```
]


.pull-right[
![](https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/51020804303_d77450ab68_b.jpg)
]

---

# Scale Bar & North Arrow

`library(ggspatial)`




.pull-left[
```{r, eval=FALSE, echo=TRUE}
p+
  annotation_scale(location = "br", style = "bar") +
  annotation_north_arrow(location = "br", 
                width = unit(.5, "cm"),
                height = unit(.75, "cm"),
                pad_y = unit(0.75, "cm"),
                pad_x = unit(0.5, "cm"),
                style = north_arrow_orienteering(
                           text_size = 8
                         )) 
```
]

.pull-right[
![](https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/51021633642_2940586b27_b.jpg)]
---

# Adding Names & Labels
.pull-left[.red[ggrepel]

`library(ggrepel)`


```{r, eval=FALSE, echo=TRUE}
geom_text_repel(data= my_points,
        aes(x=X, y=Y, label=name), 
        color = "royalblue4", 
        fontface = "bold",
        size = 3.5,
        point.padding = 0,
        box.padding = unit(.5, "cm"))
 
```
]

.pull-right[
![](https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/51020804198_06087d7679_b.jpg)
]

---

#Adding Names & Labels
.pull-left[.red[annotate]




```{r, eval=FALSE, echo=TRUE}
annotate(geom = "text",
               x = -90, y = 26, 
               label = "Gulf of Mexico", 
               fontface = "italic", 
               color = "grey22", 
               size = 4) 
```
]

.pull-right[
![](https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/51020804288_0f68a1f6c9_b.jpg)]

#Layout
.red[Arrows]

.pull-left[
```{r, eval = FALSE, echo=TRUE}
arrowA <- data.frame(x1 = 18, x2 = 25,
                y1 = 3.45, y2 = 3.55)
```

<p>&nbsp;</p>

```{r, eval=FALSE, echo=TRUE}
ggdraw(xlim = c(0, 35), ylim = c(0, 7.5)) +
  draw_plot(VA_map, x = 0, y = 0, 
    width = 25, height = 7.5) +
  draw_plot(RVA_map, x = 24, y = .5, 
    width = 10, height = 7)+
  geom_segment(aes(x = x1, y = y1, 
    xend = x2, yend = y2), data = arrowA, 
    arrow = arrow(), lineend = "round")
```
]

.pull-right[
![](https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/51021533596_3bf81e69d9_b.jpg)]
